Question: In 2009, this person was a special guest on an episode of G4's Web Soup where he came as Mark Gormley at first.
Hints: This person also appeared on the Wendy Carlos recording of Prokofiev's "Peter and the Wolf" as the narrator in 1988.
This person has performed a concert-only parody "Snack All Night" in some of his live shows.
On numerous occasions, Prince has refused this person permission to record parodies of his songs.
